title: Is watching someone trip on a banana peel actually funny? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is funny, but only because its so cliche, as to almost never hsppen.  Its a physical joke thats so old, and improbable that no one has actually seen it happen outside of vaudeville or circus clowns.   Actually it astonishing first, then it's funny

Yes and no! If I watch the actual event to actual being, I will feel bad, but not when the o my time I watch people tripping on the banana peel is in comical movie than I guess it is funny although is quite cliche this days
